Reviews.Title: “excellent Quality/Price”
Reviews.Author: Philippe_Soisy
Reviews.Content: business trips rome tired cost standard hotels report dont decency propose free wifi im happy found tre fontane people smile feel real person yes italian hotel hard believe prices lower makes excellent qualityprice ratio wifi free issue dinner evening restaurant site unless plan ahead decide dinner downtown stupid dinner hotel staying rome anyway

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Friendly, and Adequate”
Reviews.Author: WorldScout
Reviews.Content: reviewers stayed hotel short business trip found adequate hotel reasonable size clean comfy bed internet connection friendlyhelpful staff breakfast 7am food options sunday hotel immediately neighborhood taxi 10 minutes siteseeing wise neighborhood metro accessible bit hassle touristing tourist hotel fit purpose business travel takes town

Reviews.Title: “A good option for business travel”
Reviews.Author: Sinjon7
Reviews.Content: stayed 12 days consultant nearby office building perfectly comfortable fit requirements nicely importantly fast reliable wifi internet connection critical lot european hotel bathroom nice balcony reasonably quiet surroundings hotel located halfblock main road traffic noise isnt bad pedestrian noise breakfast little usual fare location probably wouldnt suit tourists 15 minute walk metro 25 minutes downtown rome rome ideal theres restaurant options neighborhood found pizza joints metro stop 20 minute walk hotel restaurant adequate

Reviews.Title: “Sound choice for this suburban area”
Reviews.Author: John987654321
Reviews.Content: spent nights business hotel overall clean comfortable quiet usual facilities served breakfast excellent coffee hotel sidestreet views couple hundred yards major metro station bus interchange suitable business city vicinity residential commercial district little available restaurants shopping metro station looked lively didnt opportunity investigate cable internet connection staff friendly helpful clientele appears business oriented hotel tourist visit content travel city metro 30 minutes hotel

Reviews.Title: “Good 3 star hotel with secure parking”
Reviews.Author: apvac
Reviews.Content: 3 star hotel restaurant breakfast comfortable beautifully decorated flat tv minibar rate cheap 3 stars considering included secure underground parking buffet breakfast reasonable value location stay eur car direct access via lift garage bathroom sufficiently shower basic facial tissue lay ok 3 star breakfast limited buffet understandable 3 star establishment common items readily available orange juice fresh fruit yoghurt croissants etc sufficiently quiet bed sufficiently comfortable night
